version_description:
Design adapted for iPhone X
New stop time setting
Revised content
Performance enhancements

- Faster game play
- More and new sounds
- New Reset button in Settings
- Win more sentences faster

Win More Sentences
Faster Game Play
Updated Settings:
Mute Sounds
Turn Off Timer
Reset Game Option
Turn Off Word Regrouping
